actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to treat certain laundry and cleaning enterprises in the same manner as other retail enterprises under that Act.

summary.text: Provides for the treatment of laundry and cleaning enterprises in the same manner as other retail enterprises under the Fair Labor Standards Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to treat certain laundry and cleaning enterprises in the same manner as other retail enterprises under that Act.
